channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Fugees Rapper Pras Michel Has Emergency Surgery For Colon Cancer, Delaying Federal Criminal Case
item.description: Sending positive vibes to Pras Michel 🙏 Wishing him a speedy recovery! #GetWellSoon #FugeesStrong 💪🎶

item.title: David Byrne Reveals He’s ‘Getting Married’ This Week, Shares Playlist
item.description: Love is in the air! 💕🎶 David Byrne's wedding playlist is the ultimate mood-booster! Check it out now! #MusicNews #DavidByrne

item.title: The Dambuilders Play First Show In 28 Years At DromFest With Members Of Fugazi, Luna, & Dexys
item.description: Guess who's back after 28 years?! 🎸 The Dambuilders are rocking out at DromFest with special guests from Fugazi, Luna, and Dexys! 🤘 #MusicLegends #DromFestBound

item.title: Oasis brought Britpop classics, bucket hats & fireworks to Metlife Stadium (Night 1 review, pics, setlist)
item.description: Oasis lit up Metlife Stadium with Britpop magic, bucket hats, and fireworks! 🎶💥 #RockOn #BritpopLegends

item.title: Watch Fifth Harmony Reunite at a Jonas Brothers Concert
item.description: 💃🎤 When Fifth Harmony surprised fans at the Jonas Brothers concert! Squad goals unlocked! #MusicalMagic✨ #ReunionVibes

item.title: Fans Choose Baylee Lynn’s ‘Cautiously Optimistic’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🎶 Baylee Lynn's 'Cautiously Optimistic' wins hearts this week! 🌟 Which track is on repeat for you? #NewMusicDiscovery 🎧

item.title: The Weeknd’s ‘Blinding Lights’ Becomes First Song to Hit 5 Billion Streams on Spotify
item.description: 🎉 The Weeknd's 'Blinding Lights' lights up Spotify with 5 billion streams! 🔥🎶 #RecordBreaker #TheWeeknd

item.title: Here Are All the K-pop Albums That Have Topped the Billboard 200: Full List
item.description: 🌟 K-pop domination on the Billboard 200! 🎶 Check out which albums made it to the top! 🎉 #KpopWin #Billboard200

item.title: Lady Gaga to Perform at VMAs 2025
item.description: 🚀 Gaga's back at it! Catch her electrifying performance at the VMAs 2025! 🎤 #LadyGaga #VMAs2025

item.title: Halsey Announces BADLANDS 10th Anniversary Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎉 Join Halsey on a musical time machine! ✨ Celebrate 10 years of BADLANDS with us! 🎶 #Halsey #BADLANDS10
